fields.name: Mustering
fields.description: Recruit new units in StrongHold and Castles.

fields.name: A Throne of Blades
fields.description: The holder of the Iron Throne Token chooses whether a) everyone updates their Supply then reconciles armies, b) everyone muster units or c) this card has no effect.

fields.name: Winter is Coming
fields.description: Immediatly shuffle this deck. Then draw and resolve a new card.

fields.name: Clash of Kings
fields.description: Bid on the three Influence tracks.

fields.name: Dark Wings, Dark Words
fields.description: The holder of the Messenger Raven token chooses whether a) everyone bids on the three Influence tracks, b) everyone collects one Power token for every power icon present in areas they control or c) this card has no effect.

fields.name: Game of Thrones
fields.description: Each player collects on Power token for each power icon printed on areas he controls.

fields.name: Winter is Coming
fields.description: Immediately shuffle this deck. Then draw an resolve a new card.

fields.name: Put to the Sword
fields.description: The holder of the Valerian Steel Blade chooses one the following conditions for this Planning Phase: a) Defense Orders cannot be played, b) March +1 Orders cannot be played, or c) no restrictions.

fields.name: Web of Lies
fields.description: Support Orders cannot be played during this Planning Phase.

fields.name: Feast for Crows
fields.description: Consolidate Orders cannot be played during this Planning Phase.

fields.name: Rains of Autumn
fields.description: March +1 Orders cannot be played during this Planning Phase.

fields.name: Sea of Storms
fields.description: Raid Orders cannot be played during this Planning Phase.

fields.name: Storm of Swords
fields.description: Defense orders cannot be played during this Planning Phase.
